resources.string: Please enter a valid payment amount.

This application is a simple petrol calculator that allows users to calculate the number of liters of petrol that can be purchased based on the payment amount they enter. With this application, users can select the type of gasoline they want to buy (for example, Pertamax or Pertalite) and enter the payment amount in rupiah. This application was created for Assessment 1 Mobpro 1. Copyright Â© 2024 Arfion Rizki Diotama All rights reserved.
